display.title: Current Study Requirements - Arcane Researcher
display.description: You have expanded your study of the laws of magic to your own research, experimenting with various effects and instruments. You require 100 bookshelves, 5 enchanting tables, 20 brewing stands, 10 lecterns, 100 blocks of amethyst, 30 glowstone, 30 quartz, and 50 lapis blocks to study.
